Row.Text: So, you are the one plotting against my kingdom? So your head shall make a fine addition to my mantle.
I am Ivan IV, and I am the Grand Prince of Moscow. One day, I shall be Tsar of All the Russias, and you had best not be in my way for when that time comes.
My cities burning... my cathedrals ruined... God has forsaken the Russian people, and I know not why...
I am forsaken...
You've things to talk about?
Why do you keep coming back? Are you hiding something from me? SPEAK!
Perhaps you should be more afraid of coming here...
I should have your tongue cut from your mouth.
Stop bringing me this nonsense!!
Only bother coming back if it's with a good offer.
You must love my company.
Hello friend. What brings you to my court this day?
Greetings.
Hello Clarice...
Speak, or have your tongue ripped out and fed to my advisors.
Come to beg for mercy?
I hope you're here to beg for your life.
Always a pleasure working with you, friend. What brings you to my court?
Once we are undone by this pathetic war, I shall take what I please from your charred remains.
I pray for your victory in your current conflict. But what do you want with me?
I will sow every last one of your soldiers in pigskin when I capture them. I keep no hostage in my empire!!
Why haven't you moved your armies yet? I don't want them near me. YOU GOT THAT?
Next time I catch one of your settlers, I'm going to boil them alive. HOW'S THAT, FRIEND?!
While I have this opportunity, I should mention THAT YOUR CONTINUED EXPANSION IS REALLY GETTING ON MY NERVES!!
You think you can throw money at the land and your right to it will just grow from it like a tree. I can do that. Not you.
Your recent trend of buying land near us is concerning. STOP IT AT ONCE!
I've heard that your military is strong. You are worthy a drink with an old friend!
Your empire is famed for its strong economy. Perhaps one day you might be willing to share some of your secrets with a friend?
Little prince, little prince, let me come in. Your throne is so beckoning and humble, it makes me salivate!
What army do you hope to raise when I send my Streltsy to massacre your treacherous little self?
Your deeds are drenched in the blood of innocents. Paranoid, are we?
You would do well to agree to a Declaration of Friendship with me. Let all the world know that you are the friend of Ivan IV!
I believe in your worth, so I propose a Declaration of Friendship between us so that I can easily tell you apart from the other rabble.
Hah! An alliance like that with you would suggest that you were worthy of my friendship. I would sooner install my wife upon the throne of St. Peter. THAT'S A LITTLE JOKE I LIKE TO MAKE.
One day I may have use for you, but that day is not now, and it is not today. Go away, you useless lump.
Friend, I have a serious matter to discuss. My relationship with {1_CivName} has broken down, and I need you to denounce them as a show of support. What do you say?

The people, the government, and the utter core of {1_CivName} is rotten, and filled with the sinful. I wish to purge these lands with the fire of God. Will you join my on this crusade? (WILL DECLARE WAR IMMEDIATELY)
YOU ARE NOW MY ENEMY.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])

You are intolerable. I should break your face, and then I should sleep with your spouse, and then I should piss on your dog.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Your treachery has gone too far. The others must know that I hate you.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR])
Oh, is that how it is? IS THAT HOW IT IS??!!
Get out of my sight before I have your eyes pulled out and served as my supper.
DO YOU WANT TO SEE WHAT DESTRUCTION LOOKS LIKE?
You are a good friend to {1_CivName}. Did you know that I, too, am a friend of theirs? Well, they like me better, but alright...
If you should get too close to {1_CivName}, I may be unable to tell where their empire ends and yours begins.
I'll have you know that {1_CivName} and I have worked together in the past, and I have the utmost respect for them. Just so you're aware.
Glad to hear there are others in the world which share my disgust with {1_CivName}. They are clearly not to be trusted.
Being on such good terms, I couldn't help but notice that you'd become friends with {1_CivName}. I have done the same. Perhaps this makeshift alliance will lead to great things in the future?
I share your convictions that {1_CivName} only causes problems for the civilized empires of the world. Perhaps the combination of our denouncements will teach them a lesson.
Oh great, now the vermin are breeding. Now I have to deal with both you and {1_CivName}? I'll have to teach them a lesson.
Anyone who you don't get along with is clearly worth building a friendship with. Give {1_CivName} my regards.
I see your armies amassed near my empire. If you wish to attack then come. Don't hide in the shadows like a child.
It's come to my attention that you have a large number of Units near my borders. I request that you move them elsewhere to avoid causing undue distress to my citizens.
Your expansion efforts are an insult. Know that there will be consequences for this.
I couldn't help but notice that you seem to be expanding into lands which I regard to be mine. I request that you reconsider this.
The aggressive manner in which you buy up territory near us is an insult. I had hoped you would be a better neighbor.
Your purchase of land in my vicinity has caused some alarm. I caution you so that this issue does not become more serious.
My disagreements with {1_PlayerName:textkey} have become too much to bear. This is a situation that can only be resolved on the battlefield. Will you join me, friend?
{1_PlayerName:textkey} has become a nuisance. One that can only be dealt with through war. I seek allies - can I count you among them?
{1_PlayerName:textkey} is a threat to the stability of this world. The time has come to deal with them once and for all. Will you assist me in this effort?

It's come to my attention that you're getting a little friendly with {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. In case you weren't aware, they're within my sphere of influence, and I'd prefer if you stayed out of it.
Do you not understand? I said no.
I will - yes. But only for now.
I AM SOVEREIGN OF RUSSIA, NOT YOU!!
How dare you. Get out of my sight!
I couldn't help but notice how pathetic you are. And when I realized it I couldn't help but share.
Ah, it's always nice to see my favorite city-state again.
I'm really getting tired of seeing your face. My hope is that one day you'll just go away or something.
At the mere sight of the cross, your soldiers turn and flee, hiding their face from the Lord, but exposing their backs to our projectiles.
I thought you might like to know that your army is a little on the weak side. Better watch your back.
Our words are backed with nuclear weapons!
It's a shame there are some leaders in this world who have their fun by picking on the weak. Don't you agree?
I can hear your people wailing in sorrow all the way over in my empire. If you don't do something soon they might just pack up and find a real civilization to live in.
With people so unhappy it's a shock to me that they'd keep you around as their leader.
It's come to my attention that your empire appears to be quite puny. Did you forget to expand your borders or are you just having a little trouble with that?
Travelers have told us that your empire's economy is in pretty sad shape. If you beg a little I might give you a hand. Okay, actually I won't.
What a sad sight... your empire is so uncultured. What do your citizens do all day, beat rocks together?
Rumor has it that your culture is so laughable that even the barbarians are shying away from your lands.
You have a resource that we require.
Let my people into your territory, and I shall allow your people to visit my magnificent cities.
I am so hostile right now, it's making me giddy.
You attacked me? Hahahahahaha - I WILL DESTROY YOU!!
You will regret the day you declared WAR ON GOD! (I mean, on me)
You are unfit to play games of war with Moscow. You will soon see why.
Your day of judgement will come.
God has whispered into my ear a fate which I cannot deny: to bring DESTRUCTION and DEATH upon your pathetic, miserable little fiefdom! Prepare to fight me!
You stand in the way of my imperial ambitions; but don't worry, your cities will belong to me soon enough.
We fight now, so that you shall no more blight this land which you so freely abuse with your un-Muscovite-ness.
Our proximity has fated us to be enemies, for you lie upon my path to the creation of a glorious Russian empire!
This world is destined to be mine. God has told me so!
So be it. My armies will extract it from your lands then.
Although feigning friendship with you wasn't very polite, few who make their mark on history were known for their manners. May your passage be swift.
I will conquer every last bit of land to which you hold claim! No peace! Get out!
Your head is still on your neck. That's no good.
Your crimes against Russia will stain my carpets red!
Our people are now becoming weary of the nobility in our nation! I worry the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.
We are glad to see that your people are growing weary of the nobility in your nation. The amazing distrust in our civilization is truly inspiring!
